code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Switch,Route,useLocation,useHistory,Redirect}from"react-router-dom";import Home from"./pages/Home";import{Project1,Project2,Project3,Project4}from"./pages/Projects";import Contact from"./pages/Contact";import{AnimatePresence}from"framer-motion";var App=function App(){var location=useLocation();var history=useHistory();useEffect(function(){var handleScrollToElement=function handleScrollToElement(e){console.log(e.wheelDeltaY);var url=window.location.origin+"/";var wheelRouter=function wheelRouter(after,before){if(e.wheelDeltaY<0){setTimeout(function(){history.push(after);},500);}else if(e.wheelDeltaY>0){setTimeout(function(){history.push(before);},500);}};switch(window.location.href.toString()){case url:if(e.wheelDeltaY<0){setTimeout(function(){history.push("projet-1");},500);}break;case url+"projet-1":wheelRouter("projet-2","");break;case url+"projet-2":wheelRouter("projet-3","projet-1");break;case url+"projet-3":wheelRouter("projet-4","projet-2");break;case url+"projet-4":wheelRouter("contact","projet-3");break;case url+"contact":if(e.wheelDeltaY>0){setTimeout(function(){history.push("projet-4");},500);}break;default:console.log("nothing");}};window.addEventListener("wheel",handleScrollToElement);},[history]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Switch,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/",component:Home}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/project-1",component:Project1}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/project-2",component:Project2}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/project-3",component:Project3}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/project-4",component:Project4}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{exact:true,path:"/contact",component:Contact}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Redirect,{to:"/"}));};export default App;
